data.eml:eml: Six new Stenus species of the cirrus group (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae) from China with a key to species of the group

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liang, Tang, Zhao, Yun-Long, Puthz, Volker (2008): Six new Stenus species of the cirrus group (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae) from China with a key to species of the group. Zootaxa 1745: 1-18, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181626
